Empath::

Not waiting for any chitchat, Empath dashes out and pulls up near to 
Aerotaur - but not so near as to make a single target of the 
two.  "What are you waiting for, fool?" she snaps.  "Eliminate him 
before his companions show up!"  So saying, she fires both her arm-
mounted plasma blasters at Wolfenstein.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He receives Rodimus's message and glances out the viewport.  
He 
> quickly scans the countryside for anything unusual.  He opens a 
wide band 
> comlink so anyone could receive it.  "I hate to discredit you, sir, 
but the 
> Predacons are here now.  It's time to fight."  He rushes out of the 
base and 
> draws an energon arrow which he aims at Wolfenstein.  He simply 
waits 
> watching for any other Predacons to arrive.
